intro.title: Welcome to SmartBadge
intro.description: SmartBadge is the next generation of GitHub repository badges, powered by semantic intelligence. Unlike traditional badges that only show basic statistics, SmartBadge understands what your code actually does and provides meaningful insights through AI-powered semantic analysis.
